name: EugeneCAD Intro
author: Boston University
description:
A short introduction to Eugene, a human- and machine-readable language developed to speed up and innovate the design of novel biological devices. The Eugene language provides facilities to specify a system of parts and devices, as well as rules to constraining their composition. The overarching goal is that Eugene becomes the clear language of choice for user-level design specifications within the synthetic biology domain.

Boston University
